Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Requires retailers of electronic cigarettes or liquid nicotine, not otherwise registered with the department of taxation and finance to sell tobacco products, to register with such department
Summary: Requires retailers of electronic cigarettes, or liquid nicotine, not otherwise registered with the department of taxation and finance to sell tobacco products, to register with such department.
LawCode: Add Art 20-C ยง492, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to the registration of vendors of electronic cigarettes
